snippet.title: Sony Action Cam HDR-AS30V
snippet.description: Joining the AS30V's new hardware features are a new waterproof housing and several accessories and mounts, bringing it closer to the competition.

snippet.title: Pinterest amps up recipe search with new filters
snippet.description: The social network adds dietary filters and the ability to search by ingredients.

snippet.title: Walmart buys recipe startup to pair with online grocery delivery
snippet.description: In its quest to tackle the online grocery delivery market and bulk up its Walmart To Go service, the retail giant snaps up the recipe-minded Yumprint.

snippet.title: Pinterest acquires recipe sharing Punchfork
snippet.description: The social site makes its first purchase, choosing the food recipe bookmarking network.

snippet.title: Let the oven remember the recipe
snippet.description: Two new Bertazzoni 30-inch ovens feature an Assistant function that can remember cooking sequences. With baking, convection baking, and broiling functions, the ovens offer an easy way to cook complicated meals.

snippet.title: Recipe for a successful Android phone
snippet.description: There are so many Android phones on the market, it's sometimes difficult to differentiate one from the next. However, there are the occasional handsets that stand out from the crowd. Here, we tell you why.

snippet.title: Tasty little recipe app one-ups Google
snippet.description: Rafe Recommends: Edamam, a refreshingly modern recipe finder that's showed off its wares today at Demo.

snippet.title: Cook the cannibal: Apple chief's secret product recipe
snippet.description: Unlike its rivals, Apple was willing to swallow hard and ultimately doom one of its traditional cash cows.

snippet.title: Yahoo adds photos to recipe, shopping search results
snippet.description: The Web giant tweaks its search results, creating a new ribbon of photos in results for recipes and product queries.

snippet.title: Toyota's new design recipe
snippet.description: Automotive News reports on Toyota's new design direction.
